text: Mata kare-ra no nakaniha, yogen-sha o komara sete,`kare wa (tada no) mimidesu.' To iu mono ga aru. Itte yaru ga i. `Kare wa anata gata no tame, yoi koto no kikitedearu, kare wa arra o shinko shi, shinja-tachi o shinrai suru. Mata anata gata no naka no shinko suru mono no tame ni wa (arra kara no) jihidearu. Arra no shito o nayamasu mono ni wa, itamashi chobatsu ga aru
